# btools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


Tools I use frequently.

Has functions in these categories:

-   dates

-   dplyr

-   formatting numbers

-   states

-   stats

-   strings

-   time series

-   general utilities

## Installation

You can install the development version of btools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("donboyd5/btools")
```
